name: Microwave transport networks service engineer
description:
Responsibilities:
  • Engineering project work - Audit projects;
  • Dealing with customer technical problem requests and requirements;
  • Implementing equipment maintenance work including inspection and rectifications;
  • Support in-field operation at customer network;
  • Pre-sale support.
Requirements:
  • Experienced within maintenance of microwave network equipment and technology;

  • Expertise in SDH, PDH, IP/MPLS, L2 networks;

  • Familiar with signal theory and planning for microwave line and routing&switching technology;

  • Understanding of recovery procedures and optimization of microwave links parameters, topology and traffic path;

  • Good troubleshooting skills;

  • Expertise in Huawei RTN and PTN series, Ericsson, Nokia, NEC microwave series equipment, Huawei transport OSS (U2000 & NCE);

  • English - Pre-Intermediate level.

Conditions:

We glad to offer you:

  • Opportunity to become an expert in top-end telecom equipment;
  • Participation in major projects across the country;
  • Professional trainings from Huawei University and mentoring program from experienced industry experts;
  • Friendly atmosphere in international team of professionals;
  • Opportunity to develop your career in different directions;
  • Annual bonus, mobile phone allowance, medical insurance.
    Are you in?
